short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find out everything you need to know about your daily Almanax offering to make sure you won't miss any!
short.fr: Retrouvez tout ce qu'il faut savoir sur l'Almanax pour être sûr de ne manquer aucune offrande.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Read directly from your browser the information of the daily Almanax offering. You will also be notified when a new offering is available.
